files.patch:
@@ -44,0 +44,7 @@
+	# verify that the warning wasn't printed
+	$(GREP) 'Warning: Class file version not specified in file or by -cv parameter' \
+	        $(@:%.ok=%)/work/JasmUsageTest.jtr > /dev/null ; rc=$$?; \
+            if [ "$$rc" -ne 1 ]; then \
+                echo "unexpected content (possibly a warning message) in JasmUsageTest.jtr" ; \
+                exit 1 ; \
+            fi
